catalog_info.title: Intermediate German: Reading, Speaking, and Aural Comprehension
catalog_info.notes: Conducted in German. Not open to auditors.
catalog_info.description: Using an interactive discussion format, this third-semester language course offers systematic vocabulary-building and a grammar review. The focus is on improving comprehension and speaking skills. Materials include short fiction and drama, poetry, contemporary film, interactive lab work, and cultural materials from German websites.
